name: pdf2svg
description: A simple PDF to SVG converter using the Poppler and Cairo libraries.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependencies.name: poppler
dependencies.description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base.

dependent_to.name: py-weblogo
dependent_to.description:
WebLogo is a web based application designed to make the generation of
sequence logos as easy and painless as possible.
